name: MoverConstraintRootBehaviorMode
type: enum
summary: |
  Values for Class.Workspace.MoverConstraintRootBehavior. Controls the logic
  for selecting the assembly root part when using various mover constraints.
description: |
  Values for Class.Workspace.MoverConstraintRootBehavior. Controls the logic
  for selecting the assembly root part when using various
  mover constraints.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: Default
    summary: |
      The default option for Class.Workspace.MoverConstraintRootBehavior.
      Currently set to Disabled.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Disabled
    summary: |
      The legacy logic will be used for assembly root part selection when a
      mechanism contains a mover constraint.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Enabled
    summary: |
      Improved logic will be used for assembly root part selection when a
      mechanism contains a mover constraint. This improved logic gives more
      consistent behavior when compared with other constraints or the deprecated
      Class.BodyMover classes.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
